g2.note: G2 scraping requires Selenium + anti-bot bypass

basic_info.note: Full job scraping not implemented - placeholder

competitive_positioning.competitive_moat: Potential network effects through collaborative research and open-source contributions, switching costs for established research workflows.
competitive_positioning.differentiation: Focus on interactive, live data within scientific publications, bridging the gap between research and communication.
competitive_advantages: Integration with scientific tools and data sources

growth_bottlenecks: Awareness and adoption within the scientific community

strengths: Addresses a critical need for better scientific communication
concerns: Monetization strategy in open science environment

next_steps: Focus on user acquisition and community building
Develop integrations with key scientific tools
expansion_opportunities: Expand to adjacent fields like engineering and data science
Offer premium features for enterprise research teams
